items.abstract:
<jats:p>The paper describes the effective mechanism for designing the Program
of universal educational actions (UUD) development in comprehensive
school pupils. It is pointed that the mechanism implies collective creative efforts
of the whole teaching staff. The relevant provisions of Federal State Educational
Standards (FGOS) of the basic general education are specified and methodically
reasonable options for their realization are offered. Schemes for analyzing the
classroom activities of pupils are given, which helps to identify manifestations of
universal educational actions. As an example the author describes the basic-level
universal educational action, ought to be developed in the 1st�9th grades � �To
define and formulate the activity purpose�. The proposed algorithm may be used
to draw up a similar UUD-development Program for senior and initial schools.
The material offered is intended for general education institutions administrative
bodies in the first place, but can be found methodically helpful to senior governing
bodies in the sphere of education. Also the material can be used in applied
experimental studies.</jats:p>
title: DESIGNING THE PROCEDURE OF UNIVERSAL EDUCATIONAL ACTIONS DEVELOPMENT AT COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS

items.abstract:
<jats:p>The article offers a fundamentally new categorical and conceptual framework (�health-saving technologies in education�, �health protection aspects
of education� and ��health-forming education�, �readiness for optimization of viability in conditions of systemic social changes�), shows its links with
other pedagogical concepts. Main directions of the domestic practice of health-saving education and given their comparative analysis. Is the baseline
model of the nature activities of the school. Defined the strategic and tactical problems of the school for the formation of health as a social and cultural
phenomenon. A system of didactic principles of constructing of the income component content in primary and basic education aimed at the formation
of healthy life style as socio-cultural personality characteristics. The program of formation of the culture of a healthy and safe lifestyle, which is a comprehensive
program of forming of knowledge, attitudes, personal benchmarks and norms of conduct for protecting and improving the physical, mental
and social health of students. Conceptual provisions of the comprehensive psychological and pedagogical monitoring of the effectiveness of school on
the formation of students social and cultural phenomenon �health�. About-appointed content and technology of preparation of the future teachers to
the design and implementation of health activities in elementary and middle schools.</jats:p>
title: The Modern Maintenance of Technologies of Schoolchildren Keeping Health in Preparation of the Teacher for Realization of Federal State Educational Standards of Initial General and Basic Formation

items.abstract: <jats:p>Historical experience of education by the means of books, known as culture of reading, started being weakened in “the age of Internet”. Novelty of the article is in the described process of impact of the book on criminals in the territory of Western Siberia considered through the cultural, historical and psychological aspects. With the use of previously unknown archival materials there are revealed the cure methods of the condemned by using the book, and the relationship to the prison literature of the political prisoners. The personality of prisoners differed by a set of moral qualities, but almost all of them were ready to the perception of people around and themselves through the literature. Illiteracy was the main obstacle in education of the condemned, but the administration of prisons opened prison schools and organized reading literature aloud. The first prison libraries appeared in the 1860-ies and were replenished generally at the expense of philanthropists. F.M. Dostoyevsky’s novels “Crime and Punishment” and “Notes from the Dead House”, fairy tales and poems by A.S. Pushkin were the most popular books: they filled life with romanticism and were a compensation factor. Political prisoners denied any educational methods, preferring to read revolutionary literature. It is impossible to track extent of impact of book on the process of correction of criminals, but it is possible to claim that libraries started forming the atmosphere of book which is the most important condition of education in prisons, and is a necessary prerequisite for correction of a convicted person.</jats:p>
title: Book as a Cure of the Condemned: From the History of Penitentiary System of Western Siberia (second half of the 19th - beginning of the 20th century)
